org.gearvrf

Class GVRPerspectiveCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRCamera
        • org.gearvrf.GVRPerspectiveCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class GVRPerspectiveCamera
extends GVRCamera
    A camera with a perspective projection.
